remarks: Value of the functor restriction operator.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
resfval.c $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
resfval.d $e |- ( ph -> H e. W ) $.
resfval $p |- ( ph -> ( F |`f H ) = <. ( ( 1st ` F ) |` dom dom H ) , ( x e. dom H |-> ( ( ( 2nd ` F ) ` x ) |` ( H ` x ) ) ) >. ) $.
$d F x $.
$d H x $.
$d ph x $.
